name: download_chains
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool priceline_com_provider.
Tool description: priceline.com | Lets you search hotels, cars for rent, flights. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other travel  api:** https://rapi.one
API description: Downloads a list of hotel chains using the provided API key and optional parameters.

resume_key.description: An optional key to resume results from a given ID. Default is None.

limit.description: The limit on the number of results to return. Default is 100.
